data.title: Raquel Torres and Nils Asther in The Sea Bat (1930)
data.meta_description: Vintage postcard. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. Cinema Illustrazione 28, series II. Raquel Torres and Nils Asther in The Sea Bat (Wesley Ruggles, 1930). Raquel Torres (1908-1987) was a Mexican-born American film actress. She had her breakthrough as a Polynesian beauty in White Shadows in the South Seas (1928). She played island girls, biracial beauties and was a sexy foil to the Marx Brothers in Duck Soup (1933). After marrying a stockbroker in 1935, she retired. Good looking Swedish actor Nils Asther (1897-1981) was an intense star of the silent European cinema. In Hollywood, he was the leading man of stars like Pola Negri, Greta Garbo, and Marion Davies and was labelled ‘the male Greta Garbo’.
data.text:
Vintage postcard. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. Cinema Illustrazione 28, series II. Raquel Torres and Nils Asther in The Sea Bat (Wesley Ruggles, 1930).

Raquel Torres (1908-1987) was a Mexican-born American film actress. She had her breakthrough as a Polynesian beauty in White Shadows in the South Seas (1928). She played island girls, biracial beauties and was a sexy foil to the Marx Brothers in Duck Soup (1933). After marrying a stockbroker in 1935, she retired.

Good looking Swedish actor Nils Asther (1897-1981) was an intense star of the silent European cinema. In Hollywood, he was the leading man of stars like Pola Negri, Greta Garbo, and Marion Davies and was labelled ‘the male Greta Garbo’.
